messages.subject: kids chat Wednesday! was, Re: kids chat today! was Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] kids chat?
messages.msgSnippet: OK, I think I have this figured out.  I just did a test with someone outside of my home and we managed to make it work.  I hope it works tomorrow! Interested
messages.messageBody:
OK, I think I have this figured out. I just did a test with someone outside of my home and we managed to make it work. I hope it works tomorrow!

Interested kids are invited to an AIM buddy chat Wednesday, Oct 8, 11 AM Pacific time.

The chat will be called KidsChat

If you can't find the chat, send an AIM to melonary and I will AIM back an invitation.

Anyone who would like to be invited at the beginning of the chat, send your AIM screen name to nellebelle@... with KidsChat in the subject line.

If you don't have AIM, you can download it free at AOL.com

Mary Ellen

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
